subject: RE: Phonak campaign is coming up
preview: Hi Andy, thanks so much for jumping in and offering here mate!    We are already tracking all elements and conversion points across this landing page and the website, however very happy to add you - e

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy, thanks so much for jumping in and offering here mate!

We are already tracking all elements and conversion points across this landing page and the website, however very happy to add you - except I don't have permissions here for this!

michael.zamani@truehearing.com.au please upgrade my permissions mate?



Stewart Webb

Partner

+61 405 835 572

1300 107 110

stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au

www.searchrescue.com.au



160 five star reviews... and counting!

Hi Stewart,

I’m jumping in for Lance here to help finalise the tracking setup so we can get this campaign moving.

To get us started, could you please grant GA4 access to: analytics@wolfiq.com.au

Once we have that, we'll ensure the tracking is aligned with your ads setup.

Hi Nikki,

Thank you for the confirmation, great to hear the page is approved and ready to move forward.

We’ve now completed the following:
  • Spelling update has been implemented
  • Page is indexable and available for search engines

For the analytics setup:
  • We’ll loop in Lance Enriquez (SEO Manager) to assist with any GA requirements.
  • Stewart can coordinate directly with Lance to align on-tracking and campaign setup.

Happy to assist 😊
coordinated with VV @andy (Inbox) regarding the GA requirement 🙏

Hi Guys,

The page is approved. Please make the spelling update identified below.

Please also ensure page is indexable as soon as possible. I'll hand over to stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au to liaise with joy@wolfiq.com.au for any GA requirements, but from my end let's kick off this campaign!

Thanks for everyone's help and input.

Regards,

Nikki

Hi Nikki,

I’m happy to confirm that all requested updates have now been completed, with the exception of the video upload.

Please see the summary below:
Completed Updates
  • All headline and content changes applied
  • Product name updated across titles, descriptions, and meta tags to Phonak Audéo (Ultra) Sphere
  • Q&A section corrected
  • Field label updated to Postcode
  • All additional text and visual adjustments included in your list

Video Upload
  • The current site has a file size limitation that prevents us from uploading the high-resolution video directly.
  • As a temporary solution, we have embedded the official Phonak YouTube version.
  • If you allow us to upload larger files, we can attempt to host the video directly on the site instead.

Clarification Needed
We also noticed the following section:
“Experience the unprecedented clarity of Phonak’s newest AI-powered Infinio (Ultra) R Sphere hearing aids. For a limited-time trial Infinio (Ultra) R Sphere for free and hear well before the holidays.”
  • Would you like this updated to Audéo Infinio (Ultra) Sphere for full consistency across the page?
  • We are happy to make this adjustment as soon as we receive confirmation.

Please let us know if you would like any additional changes.
thanks @wolfiq , I'll clarify with the client 🙏

Hi @allieB, I’ve finished the second item. However, regarding the first item, he didn't include it in the list of words to replace; it looks like he skipped it and moved straight to the 'Why choose us' section. How do you want to proceed?

Thank you @wolfiq (Glen)

Can you change this

hi, @allieB

I’m happy to confirm that I’ve completed all the items on your list, apart from the video upload.

Due to current file size restrictions on the site, we have temporarily embedded the video from Phonak's YouTube channel. However, if we are granted permission to upload larger files, we can attempt to host the video directly on the site instead.

(Time: 40mins)
- Glen

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Thank you both.

joy@wolfiq.com.au and our support@wolfiq.com.au team are on this.

We'll make these changes now and confirm.

Thank you,
Andy
Let's have the end date until 9th of January. Thanks

Hi Guys,


@michael.zamani please advise the end date asap. Once we have this and thechanges below have been applied we can go live.
@joy please change below to 'December 2025'




@Wolf IQ Support - can we please update any mention of the product name in the page title, description and meta tags to 'Phonak Audéo (Ultra) Sphere'


@stewart.webb - please ensure product name is Phonak Audéo (Ultra) Sphere for the Google ads campaign.




Hi @joy
Can we please have the following edits to the page:


Change headline to 'Try the New AI Powered Phonak Audéo (Ultra) SphereTM Hearing Aids'



Please change to: 'Why Choose the Audéo Infinio (Ultra) Sphere'





Change name per highlighted to 'Audéo Infinio (Ultra) Sphere'






\



Not sure what happened here but the question should read 'How long is the trial?'

Can you also add a comma after the word 'further' as highlighted on the fourth Q&A




Please change to 'Audéo Infinio (Ultra) Sphere'





Please change this headline to 'Book Your Free Trial Today!'





Please change this field to 'Postcode'





Can we have the video finish on a thumbnail of the video please. I hope this makes sense.





Please let me know if you need any further clarifications. If you can apply the changes asap and make live once Michael advises the end date.


Regards,
Nikki


From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 5 December 2025 3:51 PM
To: joy <joy@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: michael.zamani <michael.zamani@truehearing.com.au>; stewart.webb <stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au>; Ozeken, Nikki <Nikki.Ozeken@sonova.com>
Subject: Re: Phonak campaign is coming up


EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Michael and Nikki,

Our team has finished QA on the landing page:
https://www.truehearing.com.au/phonak-infinio-sphere-ultra-trial/

We're standing by for any updates and amendments.


Thanks,

Andy

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 4:23 PM Joy T. <joy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Michael,

We really appreciate the quick response.

We can now fully access the WordPress dashboard.

Furthermore, we'll keep you posted on any further updates from our end.


Thanks,
Joy


On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 10:43 AM Michael Zamani <michael.zamani@truehearing.com.au> wrote:
Done as a temporary access. Cheers

Kind Regards,

Michael Zamani






On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 1:14 PM Joy T. <joy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Michael,

Just a quick check in to see if you could update our website access level to Administrator.

 We're currently a bit limited, and that extra access is needed so we can get the booking form created.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Joy


On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 9:45 AM Stewart Webb <stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au> wrote:
Copy this - Google Ads only,





Stewart Webb

Partner

+61 405 835 572

1300 107 110

stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au

www.searchrescue.com.au
160 five star reviews... and counting!
Book a meeting


On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 8:15 AM Michael Zamani <michael.zamani@truehearing.com.au> wrote:
Hi Stewart,

Please leave the Facebook/Meta Ads portion of the campaign to me.

Andy and Joy,

I understand the landing page is currently being developed. Could you please provide an estimated completion date? We have already paid for this development.

Nikki, can you please organise regarding the overall communication plan for the campaign.

Thanks,
Michael Zamani






On Tue, Dec 2, 2025 at 7:52 PM Stewart Webb <stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au> wrote:
Thanks Nikki - appreciate the update and the brief.
  • Happy to launch right now - @Michael Zamani can you connect me with your web developer so we can have the landing page built?
  • Michael - we are not running meta ads for you - would you like to run this? I'll need to send over a setup form - our fees on a per platform basis is $400/m
  • @Ozeken, Nikki what is the budget assigned to this activation?
  • Also happy to build a meta ads carousel ad however we need imagery for the carousel itself (square)







Stewart Webb

Partner - Sales Manager


+61 405 835 572

Stewart.Webb@searchrescue.com.au

www.searchrescue.com.au
Over 160 five star reviews... and counting!

On Fri, Nov 28, 2025 at 11:38 AM Nikki Ozeken wrote:

Hi Stewart,

Happy Friday! I hope all is going well and you're looking forward to a well-earned festive break!

I wanted to give you an update. The landing page is being developed as we speak. We're aiming for the 1 Dec to go live. Please confirm with Michael the end date.

Attached is the landing page brief for your reference.

I'm hoping to share the draft with Michael early next week.

I've looped in @Joy T.and @Andy Crebar from WolfIQ who are developing the page. Please reach out to them if you needed any other specifics for the Google ads campaign.

I am recommending FB marketing also. Preferably an ad campaign. Below is suggested copy and a tagline and I'm hoping to have a post image developed once the landing page is finalised.

Leave it to you but a carousel style ad would be great. We could have the first tile promoting the offer, a tile with a sound demo video, the others could be a couple of feature lifestyles and the last one that promotes the clinic's and maybe a pic of Michael with the team or working with a client. All images and the video to be co-branded. Would you prefer I send you the assets or would you like us to add the logos and send to you.

I don't have much data on how lead gen ads perform, but maybe we can try a lead gen style ad also?

Please let me know if you need any further info at this point.

FB ad copy

Hear the power of AI-enhanced clarity - trial Infinio Ultra R Sphere.

If you've been struggling to follow conversations - especially in noisy places - the new Infinio Ultra R Sphere could be the breakthrough you've been waiting for.

Built with next-generation processing and advanced directional clarity, it helps you hear effortlessly in the moments that matter most.

✅ Clearer speech in challenging noise
✅ Natural, comfortable sound
✅ Smart technology that adapts to your environment
✅ Discreet, modern design

Book your obligation-free trial today and experience the difference for yourself - the clarity is instant.

Regards,

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing Manager ANZ

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: sonova.com/en

From: Stewart Webb <stewart.webb@searchrescue.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 25 November 2025 10:00 PM
To: michael.zamani <michael.zamani@truehearing.com.au>; Ozeken, Nikki <Nikki.Ozeken@sonova.com>
Subject: Phonak campaign is coming up

EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Michael, Nikki,

Thanks for the heads up. We'll keep an eye out for the details and are ready to get started as soon as you send through the info. Looking forward to working with you again as always Nikki!

Cheers,

Stewart Webb

Partner - Sales Manager

+61 405 835 572

Stewart.Webb@searchrescue.com.au

www.searchrescue.com.au

Over 160 five star reviews... and counting!

On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 12:35 PM Michael Zamani wrote:

Hi Stewart,

Hope you are well.

Nikki from Sonova (Phonak) is organising a webpage for a campaign launching in December and would like your team to manage the Google Ads side of it.

She will be in contact shortly with further details and instructions.

Please let me know if you have any questions in the meantime.

Thanks,

Michael Zamani
